name: Jack of Clubs (GMTK 2022)
description:
Jack has found herself in the possession of time-rewinding magic dice! What better to do than hit up Purgatory's finest Casino to test the limits of her newfound Luck.

Explore the Casino, chat with the denizens of Purgatory, and battle Floor Bosses to work your way to the top! 

Game has two endings.

Takes about 5-10 minutes to play.

Made in 48 hours as part of GMTK Game Jam 2022

Credits:
